problem:
i1 = (float(random.randrange(100,300,1))-200)/10 i2 = (float(random.randrange(100,300,1))-200)/10 i3 = (float(random.randrange(100,300,1))-200)/10
i6 = -(i1 + i2) i5 = i6 + i3 i4 = -(i1 + i5)
In the circuit shown there are six unknown elements.
By measurements we have found three of the branch currents: \(i_1=$i1\)A, \(i_2=$i2\)A, and \(i_3=$i3\)A.
what is the current \(i_4\)?
what is the current \(i_5\)?
what is the current \(i_6\)?
